join_PermissionAlertDialog_DialogTitle: 允许KidsLoop Live使用媒体设备权限
join_PermissionAlertDialog_DialogContent: Kidsloop Live需要访问摄像头和麦克风，以便其他参与者能够看到你和听到你的声音。.
Kidsloop Live需要访问麦克风，以便在课堂上进行互动内容。.
close_confirm_description_1: Would you like to close the window?
upload_file_not_supported: This file format is not supported. Please try another file.
upload_file_too_big: Uploaded file should not be bigger than 100 MB. Please try another file.
confirm_delete_description: Are you sure you want to Delete?
submission_failed_message: Oops, an unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
block_for_assessment_completed: This assignment has already been assessed by the teacher and can no longer be edited or re-submitted.
file_upload_failed: File upload failed. Please check your file and try again.
confirm_to_upload_file: Selected file will be uploaded. Do you want to continue?
err_try_after_uploaded: Can't complete submitting. Please try after file uploading is finished.
confirm_download_file_description: You are currently not connected to Wi-Fi. Do you want to continue downloading this file using cellular data?
confirm_upload_file_description: You are currently not connected to Wi-Fi. Do you want to continue uploading this file using cellular data?
err_join_live_failed: You can only start a class 15 minutes before the start time.
confirm_access_file_title: "KidsLoop" Would Like to Access Your Files
confirm_access_file_description: File access is needed to accomplish the assignments given to you.
err_400_subtitle: 由于无效的语法，服务器无法理解该请求
err_403_subtitle_not_supported: 您至少得加入一个机构
err_403_description_not_supported: 该组织可以由你的老师邀请。此外，教师不允许使用学生应用程序。请使用电脑浏览器登录老师账号开始直播课程。
err_403x01_subtitle: You don't have permission to access. Please check your credentials and try again.
err_403x02_subtitle: You don't have permission to access. Please check your credentials and try again.
join_permissionAlertDialog_title: 允许KidsLoop 直播访问你的媒体设备
join_permissionAlertDialog_contentText_l: Kidsloop Live需要接入摄像头和麦克风，以便其他参与者能够看到你并听到你的声音
join_permissionAlertDialog_contentText_c: KidsLoop直播需要接入麦克风，进行课内互动内容
allow_media_permission: 如果您想要使用媒体设备，请授权允许使用你的话筒和相机
error_webrtc_unavailable: 错误：WebRTC 上下文不可用
error_unknown_error: 对不起！发生了一些错误
no_participants: 目前还没有人进入班级...
cols_camera_per_row: 一行中显示的摄像头数量
cols_observe_per_row: 一行中显示的学生屏幕数量
browser_guide_title_macos: KidsLoop Live在Mac OS系统中支持Safari 和Chrome 浏览器
browser_guide_title_ios: KidsLoop Live在iOS系统中仅支持Safari浏览器
browser_guide_body: 请下载支持的浏览器并重试

loading_mediaPermission: 需要相机和麦克风的权限。请授予权限并重新启动应用程序.
